00061 enum L4_irq_flow_type
00062 {
00063   L4_IRQ_F_NONE       = 0,     
00064   L4_IRQ_F_LEVEL      = 0x2,   
00065   L4_IRQ_F_EDGE       = 0x0,   
00066   L4_IRQ_F_POS        = 0x0,   
00067   L4_IRQ_F_NEG        = 0x4,   
00068   L4_IRQ_F_BOTH       = 0x8,   
00069   L4_IRQ_F_LEVEL_HIGH = 0x3,   
00070   L4_IRQ_F_LEVEL_LOW  = 0x7,   
00071   L4_IRQ_F_POS_EDGE   = 0x1,   
00072   L4_IRQ_F_NEG_EDGE   = 0x5,   
00073   L4_IRQ_F_BOTH_EDGE  = 0x9,   
00074   L4_IRQ_F_MASK       = 0xf,   
00075 };

00082 enum L4_icu_opcode
00083 {
00089   L4_ICU_OP_BIND = 0,
00090 
00096   L4_ICU_OP_UNBIND = 1,
00097 
00103   L4_ICU_OP_INFO = 2,
00104 
00110   L4_ICU_OP_MSI_INFO = 3,
00111 
00117   L4_ICU_OP_UNMASK   = 4,
00118 
00124   L4_ICU_OP_MASK     = 5,
00125 
00131   L4_ICU_OP_SET_MODE = 6,
00132 };
00133 
00134 enum L4_icu_ctl_op
00135 {
00136   L4_ICU_CTL_UNMASK = 0,
00137   L4_ICU_CTL_MASK   = 1
00138 };

00312 l4_icu_control_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, unsigned op,

00314                  l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW;

00317 /**************************************************************************
00318  * Implementations
00319  */
00320 
00321 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00322 l4_icu_bind_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_cap_idx_t irq,
00323               l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00324 {
00325   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00326   m->mr[0] = L4_ICU_OP_BIND;
00327   m->mr[1] = irqnum;
00328   m->mr[2] = l4_map_obj_control(0, 0);
00329   m->mr[3] = l4_obj_fpage(irq, 0, L4_FPAGE_RWX).raw;
00330   return l4_ipc_call(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 2, 1, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00331 }
00332 
00333 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00334 l4_icu_unbind_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_cap_idx_t irq,
00335                 l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00336 {
00337   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00338   m->mr[0] = L4_ICU_OP_UNBIND;
00339   m->mr[1] = irqnum;
00340   m->mr[2] = l4_map_obj_control(0, 0);
00341   m->mr[3] = l4_obj_fpage(irq, 0, L4_FPAGE_RWX).raw;
00342   return l4_ipc_call(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 2, 1, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00343 }
00344 
00345 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00346 l4_icu_info_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, l4_icu_info_t *info,
00347               l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00348 {
00349   l4_msgtag_t res;
00350   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00351   m->mr[0] = L4_ICU_OP_INFO;
00352   res = l4_ipc_call(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 1, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00353   if (!l4_msgtag_has_error(res) && l4_msgtag_label(res) >= 0
00354       && l4_msgtag_words(res) >= 3)
00355     {
00356       info->features = m->mr[0];
00357       info->nr_irqs  = m->mr[1];
00358       info->nr_msis  = m->mr[2];
00359     }
00360   return res;
00361 }
00362 
00363 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00364 l4_icu_msi_info_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_umword_t *msg,
00365                   l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00366 {
00367   l4_msgtag_t res;
00368   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00369   m->mr[0] = L4_ICU_OP_MSI_INFO;
00370   m->mr[1] = irqnum;
00371   res = l4_ipc_call(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 2, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00372   if (!l4_msgtag_has_error(res) && l4_msgtag_label(res) >= 0
00373       && l4_msgtag_words(res) >= 1)
00374     *msg = m->mr[0];
00375   return res;
00376 }
00377 
00378 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00379 l4_icu_set_mode_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_umword_t mode,
00380                   l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00381 {
00382   l4_msg_regs_t *mr = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00383   mr->mr[0] = L4_ICU_OP_SET_MODE;
00384   mr->mr[1] = irqnum;
00385   mr->mr[2] = mode;
00386   return l4_ipc_call(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 3, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00387 }
00388 
00389 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00390 l4_icu_control_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, unsigned op,
00391                  l4_umword_t *label, l4_timeout_t to,
00392                  l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00393 {
00394   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb);
00395   m->mr[0] = L4_ICU_OP_UNMASK + op;
00396   m->mr[1] = irqnum;
00397   if (label)
00398     return l4_ipc_send_and_wait(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 2, 0, 0),
00399                                 label, to);
00400   else
00401     return l4_ipc_send(icu, utcb, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_IRQ, 2, 0, 0), to);
00402 }
00403 
00404 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00405 l4_icu_mask_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_umword_t *label,
00406               l4_timeout_t to, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00407 { return l4_icu_control_u(icu, irqnum, L4_ICU_CTL_MASK, label, to, utcb); }
00408 
00409 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00410 l4_icu_unmask_u(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_umword_t *label,
00411                 l4_timeout_t to, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00412 { return l4_icu_control_u(icu, irqnum, L4_ICU_CTL_UNMASK, label, to, utcb); }

00443 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00444 l4_icu_set_mode(l4_cap_idx_t icu, unsigned irqnum, l4_umword_t mode) L4_NOTHROW
00445 {
00446   return l4_icu_set_mode_u(icu, irqnum, mode, l4_utcb());
